metadata.narrative: Blessed spike trap with sanctified iron teeth. Each spike carries divine judgment against those who trespass. The holy blessing ensures the wounds resist healing magic.

name: Blessed Spike Trap
effect: Triggers on contact, 32 damage + bleed

metadata.narrative: Weathered healing beacon emanating restorative energy aged by time. The crystal matrix has stabilized over decades, providing steady reliable healing. Ancient runes pulse with each healing wave.

name: Weathered Healing Beacon
effect: Heals 11 HP/sec in 6 unit radius for 2 minutes

metadata.narrative: Blessed poison trap releasing sanctified toxins. The holy venom purges corruption while inflicting divine punishment. Blessed carapace filters ensure targeted delivery.

name: Blessed Poison Trap
effect: Triggers on proximity, 55 damage + freeze

metadata.narrative: Weathered bear trap with time-tested steel jaws. Decades of use have refined its brutal efficiency. The teeth dig deep and refuse to let go.

name: Weathered Bear Trap
effect: Triggers on contact, 27 damage + immobilize for 5 seconds

metadata.narrative: Tarnished net launcher firing spectral thread nets. The mithril frame shows age but maintains precision. Each net weaves itself tighter the more prey struggles.

name: Tarnished Net Launcher
effect: Fires net that slows enemies by 85% for 12 seconds

metadata.narrative: Crystal flamethrower turret channeling elemental storm energy. The conflicting elements create unstable but devastating combustion. Water feeds the lightning, lightning ignites the air.

name: Crystal Flamethrower Turret
effect: Sweeps cone of fire, 65 damage + lingering burn

metadata.narrative: Pale laser turret with washed-out light crystals. Faded but focused, the beam cuts with surgical precision. The pale glow belies devastating power.

name: Pale Laser Turret
effect: Fires concentrated light beam, 78 damage, 12 unit range

metadata.narrative: Tarnished cluster bomb with aged steel casing. The blast powder has crystallized over time, creating more violent fractures. One becomes eight, eight become devastation.

name: Tarnished Cluster Bomb
effect: Splits into 8 smaller explosions, total 115 damage over wide area

metadata.narrative: Earth-attuned EMP device grounding all electrical energy. Mithril channels void essence into a pulse that returns technology to stone age. The earth crystal stabilizes the discharge pattern.

name: Earth EMP Device
effect: Disables all mechanical devices in 9 unit radius for 35 seconds

metadata.narrative: Faded grappling hook with essence-infused line. The copper has lost its luster but the blood-forged cable never breaks. Air crystals reduce weight during ascent.

name: Faded Grappling Hook
effect: Launches grappling hook up to 16 units, pulls player to location

metadata.narrative: Soft iron jetpack with malleable fire crystal propulsion. The flexible construction absorbs impact better than rigid designs. Gentle thrust provides smooth, controllable flight.

name: Soft Jetpack
effect: Enables flight for up to 28 seconds, recharge time 2 minutes

metadata.narrative: Faded resource scanner with shadow-attuned detection. The dimmed crystals see through stone and earth to hidden veins. Shale resonators amplify mineral signatures.

name: Faded Resource Scanner
effect: Reveals resource deposits within 25 unit radius, highlights rare materials

metadata.narrative: Earth-forged teleporter pad bending space through chaos matrices. Etherion framework holds reality stable during transit. Phoenix ash marks the path between points in spacetime.

name: Earth Teleporter Pad
effect: Creates linked teleportation points, instant travel between paired pads

metadata.narrative: Faded auto-collector with golem-core automation. The ancient guardian's memory drives item collection routines. Lightning powers the gathering mechanism indefinitely.

name: Faded Auto Collector
effect: Automatically collects items within 8 unit radius, stores up to 100 items

metadata.narrative: Earth shield generator projecting protective barriers. Lightning-charged steel creates an electromagnetic dome. Layered shale provides grounding for the energy field.

name: Earth Shield Generator
effect: Projects energy shield in 7 unit radius, absorbs 200 damage before breaking

metadata.narrative: Soft slow field generator emanating frost energy. Malleable tin channels ice essence in expanding waves. Water crystals extend the field's duration and coverage.

name: Soft Slow Field Generator
effect: Creates slow field in 6 unit radius, reduces movement speed by 70%

metadata.narrative: Faded repair drone with adamantine construction tools. Frost essence cools overheated repairs while essence blood fuels the repair matrix. Autonomous maintenance never sleeps.

name: Faded Repair Drone
effect: Repairs equipment within 5 unit radius, 15 durability per minute

metadata.narrative: Earth proximity alarm with lightning copper sensors. Beetle carapace resonators detect the slightest vibration. The alarm's shriek echoes through stone and soil.

name: Earth Proximity Alarm
effect: Triggers loud alarm when entities enter 4 unit radius

metadata.narrative: Vivid basic arrow turret with rich copper mechanisms. Enhanced with wolf sinew drawstring and ash wood frame. Simple springs, devastating results.

name: Vivid Basic Arrow Turret
effect: Fires arrows at enemies, 22 damage, 5.5 unit range

metadata.narrative: Shiny fire arrow turret gleaming with elemental power. Steel frame houses air-pressurized ignition chambers. Each arrow becomes a comet of destruction.

name: Shiny Fire Arrow Turret
effect: Fires flaming arrows, 38 damage + burn, 7.5 unit range

metadata.narrative: Shadow lightning cannon wreathed in darkness. Adamantine conducts the storm's fury through ebony insulators. Light gems focus the discharge into devastating precision.

name: Shadow Lightning Cannon
effect: Fires lightning bolts, 75 damage + chain, 11 unit range

metadata.narrative: Brilliant fire bomb radiating intense heat. Copper casing contains compressed air and fire crystals. The explosion outshines the sun for one brilliant moment.

name: Brilliant Fire Bomb
effect: Explodes for 78 fire damage + lingering flames

metadata.narrative: Shiny frost mine gleaming with trapped winter. Tin housing conducts shadow-enhanced ice essence. The blast freezes the moment itself.

name: Shiny Frost Mine
effect: Triggers on proximity, 52 damage + slow

metadata.narrative: Cursed spike trap corrupted by dark magic. Lightning copper enhances the pain while mithril spikes never dull. Wolf pelt padding muffles the mechanism's sound.

name: Cursed Spike Trap
effect: Triggers on contact, 34 damage + bleed

metadata.narrative: Vibrant healing beacon pulsing with intense life energy. Steel framework channels lightning and iron scale harmonics. The healing wave feels like summer rain.

name: Vibrant Healing Beacon
effect: Heals 12 HP/sec in 6 unit radius for 2 minutes

metadata.narrative: Cursed poison trap spreading corrupted toxins. Slime gel carries frost essence deep into the bloodstream. The corruption spreads with every heartbeat.

name: Cursed Poison Trap
effect: Triggers on proximity, 58 damage + freeze

metadata.narrative: Vibrant bear trap blazing with intense power. Iron jaws reinforced with living ichor create unbreakable grip. The trap remembers every creature it has caught.

name: Vibrant Bear Trap
effect: Triggers on contact, 28 damage + immobilize for 6 seconds

metadata.narrative: Flawless net launcher with perfect essence-thread weaving. Tin conducts the blood magic that animates the nets. Wolf sinew provides the launching tension.

name: Flawless Net Launcher
effect: Fires net that slows enemies by 90% for 15 seconds

metadata.narrative: Ancient flamethrower turret from a forgotten age. Mithril has witnessed eons, void essence fuels eternal flames. The water crystals paradoxically intensify the inferno.

name: Ancient Flamethrower Turret
effect: Sweeps cone of fire, 68 damage + lingering burn

metadata.narrative: Pure laser turret with pristine light crystal focus. Untainted copper conducts energy with zero loss. The beam is as pure as starlight, as deadly as the void.

name: Pure Laser Turret
effect: Fires concentrated light beam, 85 damage, 13 unit range

metadata.narrative: Flawless cluster bomb with perfect blast powder ratios. Steel casing fragments with mathematical precision. Eight perfect explosions from one perfect throw.

name: Flawless Cluster Bomb
effect: Splits into 8 smaller explosions, total 125 damage over wide area

metadata.narrative: Shadow EMP device pulling technology into darkness. Etherion bends probability against all electronics. Storm hearts unleash electromagnetic apocalypse.

name: Shadow EMP Device
effect: Disables all mechanical devices in 10 unit radius for 40 seconds

metadata.narrative: Vivid grappling hook burning with rich elemental power. Mithril hook bites into any surface while essence blood cable never snaps. Fire crystals provide explosive propulsion.

name: Vivid Grappling Hook
effect: Launches grappling hook up to 18 units, pulls player to location

metadata.narrative: Shiny jetpack gleaming with elemental thrust. Magical tin channels air crystal propulsion with water crystal cooling. The gleam is almost as bright as the user's smile.

name: Shiny Jetpack
effect: Enables flight for up to 32 seconds, recharge time 2 minutes

metadata.narrative: Vivid resource scanner with rich shadow detection. Steel housing protects delicate dark-attuned sensors. Shale layering amplifies the scanner's depth.

name: Vivid Resource Scanner
effect: Reveals resource deposits within 28 unit radius, highlights rare materials

metadata.narrative: Shadow teleporter pad ripping through spacetime darkness. Etherion refuses to acknowledge distance. Chaos matrices rewrite the rules of here and there.

name: Shadow Teleporter Pad
effect: Creates linked teleportation points, instant travel between paired pads

metadata.narrative: Vivid auto-collector blazing with collection efficiency. Golem core programming optimized through centuries. Lightning shard powers perpetual operation.

name: Vivid Auto Collector
effect: Automatically collects items within 9 unit radius, stores up to 120 items

metadata.narrative: Shadow shield generator cloaking allies in protective darkness. Lightning creates the barrier, darkness conceals it. Shale anchors the field to reality.

name: Shadow Shield Generator
effect: Projects energy shield in 8 unit radius, absorbs 220 damage before breaking

metadata.narrative: Shiny slow field generator gleaming with frost power. Magical tin amplifies ice essence across vast areas. Basalt foundation keeps the field stable.

name: Shiny Slow Field Generator
effect: Creates slow field in 7 unit radius, reduces movement speed by 75%

metadata.narrative: Vivid repair drone with rich elemental repair systems. Adamantine tools never wear, frost essence prevents overheating. Essence blood fuels endless repairs.

name: Vivid Repair Drone
effect: Repairs equipment within 6 unit radius, 18 durability per minute

metadata.narrative: Shadow proximity alarm detecting threats through darkness. Steel resonators amplified by frost essence sensitivity. Wolf pelt dampens false alarms.

name: Shadow Proximity Alarm
effect: Triggers loud alarm when entities enter 4.5 unit radius

metadata.narrative: Pale basic arrow turret with washed-out elegance. Steel precision meets pine flexibility. Wolf sinew draws with faded but reliable power.

name: Pale Basic Arrow Turret
effect: Fires arrows at enemies, 21 damage, 5.5 unit range

metadata.narrative: Tarnished fire arrow turret with worn but deadly mechanisms. Mithril aged but unbroken, pine seasoned to perfection. Each flaming arrow carries centuries of refinement.

name: Tarnished Fire Arrow Turret
effect: Fires flaming arrows, 37 damage + burn, 7.5 unit range

metadata.narrative: Crystal lightning cannon with perfectly faceted storm focusing. Mithril conducts through ebony insulators. Frost essence stabilizes the storm heart's fury into a beam of pure destruction.

name: Crystal Lightning Cannon
effect: Fires lightning bolts, 80 damage + chain, 12 unit range

metadata.narrative: Dull fire bomb with dimmed but dependable ignition. Iron contains the blast while fire crystals provide the inferno. The explosion may lack flair but delivers results.

name: Dull Fire Bomb
effect: Explodes for 72 fire damage + lingering flames

metadata.narrative: Tarnished frost mine with aged but potent ice magic. Tin conducts frost essence through worn channels. The explosion freezes everything, including regret.

name: Tarnished Frost Mine
effect: Triggers on proximity, 54 damage + slow

metadata.narrative: Enchanted spike trap humming with magical potential. Iron foundation enhanced by adamantine spikes. Beetle carapace triggers ensure precise activation.

name: Enchanted Spike Trap
effect: Triggers on contact, 35 damage + bleed

metadata.narrative: Dusty healing beacon with faint but persistent glow. Steel framework channels frost-cooled restoration energy. Dire fang harmonics amplify the healing pulse.

name: Dusty Healing Beacon
effect: Heals 10 HP/sec in 5.5 unit radius for 2 minutes

metadata.narrative: Enchanted poison trap crackling with magical toxins. Lightning copper conducts the venom charge. Slime gel carries frost essence into the bloodstream with supernatural efficiency.

name: Enchanted Poison Trap
effect: Triggers on proximity, 60 damage + freeze

metadata.narrative: Dusty bear trap with faint but functional mechanisms. Iron jaws reinforced with iron scale plating. The trap may look old but it catches just as well as new.

name: Dusty Bear Trap
effect: Triggers on contact, 26 damage + immobilize for 5.5 seconds
